intertrust.utils

Class XMLFile

  • java.lang.Object
    • intertrust.utils.XMLFile

  • public class XMLFile
extends java.lang.Object
    Read and write XML files with generic content from .xml to object and from object to .xml.
    Author:
    UMA

         java.lang.Class<T> typeParameterClass)
        Reads an XML file and returns the content as an object of the specified class.
        Parameters:
        file - XML file.
        typeParameterClass - Class of the main object in the XML file.
        Returns:
        Content as an object of the specified class.

                     java.lang.Class<T> typeParameterClass)
        Creates a new XML file and writes the content of the specified object into the XML file.
        Parameters:

        content - Content as an object of the specified class.
        typeParameterClass - Class of the object with the content.

      • writeTemp

                         T content,
                         java.lang.Class<T> typeParameterClass)
        Creates a new temporal XML file and writes the content of the specified object into the XML file.
        Parameters:
        filename - name of the temporal XML file.
        content - Content as an object of the specified class.
        typeParameterClass - Class of the object with the content.
        Returns:
        File.
